manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: JSR88/77 Sun Java System Web Server 6.1 Module
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module allows development and execution of web applications with the Sun Java System Web Server 6.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.javahelp/1 > 1.0, org.openide.io > 1.1.2, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.openide.debugger > 1.0, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeserver/3 > 1.1.3, org.netbeans.modules.schema2beans/1, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeapis/1, org.netbeans.libs.xerces/1, com.sun.rave.preview.support/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enterprise Java Bean Support
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for Enterprise Java Bean consumption in web applications. This is a preview feature.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: com.sun.rave.project/1, com.sun.rave.toolbox/1, com.sun.rave.designer/1 > 0.2, org.openide.loaders > 4.11, org.openide.io > 1.1.2, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeserver/3, org.netbeans.api.web.dd/1, com.sun.tools.appserver/1, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1, com.sun.rave.preview.support/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Preview Support
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module enables or disables the preview features in Sun Java Studio Creator.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables viewing Java API Reference in the IDE.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Java API Reference module enables you to view Java Platform API Specification within the IDE.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports writing of build scripts.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Ant module integrates Apache's Ant build tool into the IDE. Ant is a Java- and XML-based build tool, which you can use to write scripts to build, test, and deploy applications.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.javahelp/1 > 1.0, org.openide.compiler > 1.0, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.openide.io > 1.0, org.netbeans.libs.xerces/1 > 1.2, org.netbeans.api.java/1 > 1.3

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: JSR88/77 Sun Java System Application Server 8 Tool Module
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Plugin to integrate Sun Java System Application Server 8 Jsr-77 and Jsr-88 implementations
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.javahelp/1 > 1.0, org.openide.io > 1.1.2, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeserver/3 > 1.1.3,org.netbeans.modules.schema2beans/1,org.netbeans.modules.j2eeapis/1, org.netbeans.libs.xerces/1, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.jpda/1, org.openide.debugger > 1.0,org.netbeans.modules.debugger.core/3, org.netbeans.modules.xml.catalog/2 > 0.9

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Declares NetBeans autoupdate centers.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: It's module which contains the declaration of NetBeans update centers for Autoupdate module.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables dynamic updating of IDE through the Update Center.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Auto Update module enables the IDE to connect to the Update Center server, download updated and new modules, and automatically install the modules.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Support for creating JavaBeans(TM) components.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Bean Patterns module provides support for developing JavaBeans(TM) components in the IDE, such as generation of properties, event sets, and BeanInfo.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Provides read-only access to Java class files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Classfile Reader module provides direct read-only access to Java class files, showing all of a class's members and attributes.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports work with Java class files without source.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Sourceless Java Classes module enables you to work with class files that are without their corresponding source file. It also supports serialized JavaBeans components.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Part of the core supporting compilation.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds support for compilation into the platform. Contains classeswhich implement the compilation part of APIs and resources forexecution user interface and settings.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Implementations of deprecated APIs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: A few classes needed for compatibility with users of deprecated APIs. Normally not needed at runtime.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Deprecation-Message: The Deprecated Core module is primarily used to support the Deprecated APIs module. Users of org.netbeans.core.ModuleInstaller should switch to org.netbeans.core.modules.TestModuleDeployer.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Implementation of the Execution engine.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds support for execution into the platform. Contains classes which implement the execution part of APIs and resources for theUI of compilation an it's settings.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Makes the IDE from the platform.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds classes and resources usefull for building IDEs on top of the platform.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Output Window implementation.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides the NetBeans Output Window.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: A library for storing settings in custom formats.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module provides the Settings API for storing module-defined settings in custom formats. It also provides several useful settings format implementations.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: User interface of the platform.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides classes and resources for the standard basic user interface ofthe platform and for applications build on top of the platform.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: AutoUpdate Package for Core Library
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: AutoUpdate Package for Core Library

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module provides very basic support for CSS editing.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module provides very basic support for CSS editing. CSS documents can be opened in text editor with syntax coloring. There is a syntax check action.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Database and Data Source related
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for Database and Data Sources in the server navigator and query builder
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: com.sun.rave.project/1 > 1.0.1, com.sun.rave.insync/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.toolbox/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.designer/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.servernav/1, org.openide.io > 1.1.2, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeserver/3 > 1.1.3, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeapis/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Deployment Descriptor API.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module provides API for getting and manipulating web module deployment descriptor.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The IDE's basic infrastructure for debugging.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Debugger Core module provides the basic infrastructure in the IDE for debugging. Modules for specific debugger implementations are based on this module.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables debugging with the JPDA debugger implementation.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The JPDA Debugger module enables you to debug applications using the Java Platform Debugging Architecture.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.debugger.core/3 > 2.3, org.openide.src > 1.0, org.openide.compiler > 1.0, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.openide.io > 1.0, org.openide.debugger > 1.0

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The Visual Editor enables you to create pages in WYSIWYG mode
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Visual Editor provides a WYSIWYG canvas where you can drag and drop components to edit your page.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.openide.io > 1.1.2, com.sun.rave.insync/1 > 1.0.2, org.netbeans.modules.java/1, com.sun.rave.project/1 > 1.0.1, com.sun.rave.toolbox/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1 > 1.0.2, org.netbeans.api.xml/1, org.netbeans.modules.editor/1 > 1.14.3, org.netbeans.modules.diff/1 > 1.6, org.netbeans.libs.xerces/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Creator Design-Time API
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Extensions to the Java Beans Component Model needed to better handle design-time manipulation of live component objects in a visual design environment.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Provides the diff action to view file differences.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Diff module provides an action, that is enabled when two files are selected in the IDE. It is based on an external diff utility, that is executed to obtain the differences, which are then shown to the user graphically.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables editing of files in the IDE.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Editor module enables you to edit source files within the IDE. It provides syntax coloring for Java and HTML files, word matching, code completion, and other basic and advanced features.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Java Server Faces (JSF) Libraries
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Deployment and design time libraries for Java Server Faces (JSF)

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Web Application error handler client
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides client-side support for handling error occurs in a Web Application

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Web Application error handler server
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides server-side support for handling error occurs in a Web Application

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables integration of external web browsers with the IDE.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The External Browser module enables the integration of external web browsers with the IDE for viewing Javadoc documentation and testing applets and web (JSP and servlet) applications. It provides an alternative to the built-in HTML Browser.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports creation, editing, and viewing of HTML files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The HTML module supports creation and editing of HTML files and enables you to view them in a web browser.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports viewing of image files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Image module provides support for viewing image files in the IDE. It includes zoom and grid functions.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: InSync provides abstract source manipulation support for Java, XML and HTML
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: InSync provides abstract source manipulation support for Java, XML and HTML
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.openide.io > 1.1.2, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.project/1 > 1.0.1, org.netbeans.modules.editor/1 > 1.14.3, org.openide.loaders > 4.11, org.netbeans.libs.xerces/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: J2EE(TM) Application Deployment and Management API Library
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: J2EE(TM) Application Deployment and Management API Library

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Common J2EE Editor Framework
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Common library for building J2EE editors

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports J2EE application servers
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The j2eeserver module enables J2EE development modules to configure, deploy, and debug J2EE components on J2EE application servers that have a server plugin module using the server integration API.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: APIs for Java development support modules
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Allows other modules to use services provided by Java module.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Serves as a model for the structure of Java source files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains the org.openide.src.* API packages which model Java source files, and also class files.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports work with Java source files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Java Source Files module enables the IDE for development in Java Language. It delivers three Java compilers and allows to execute Java classes. It also provides visual representation of Java source structure in the Explorer and property sheets for inspecting or altering field, method and class declarations. In addition it provides these features: - templates for a main class, exception, interface and a generic class - Wizard for easy and fast creation of new classes - when an interface changes, suggests necessary updates to implementing classes - tool for easy overriding of methods - customizers for fields, methods or classes ... and many more. From version 1.11: - error checking on background and error markers visible in the code editor From version 1.10: - ability to make clever project builds, when some of classes change. Javamake tool is used to track and analyze the changes. From version 1.7: - supports different encodings for individual source files - support for `assert' keyword introduced in JDK-1.4 From version 1.6: - tool for managing import statements

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Permits JavaHelp help sets to be added to the IDE.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains the actual JavaHelp runtime library, and the implementation of the part of the Modules API which permits other modules to install help sets using JavaHelp technology.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module ensures full JAXP 1.1 implementation will be available.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module ensures full JAXP 1.1 implementation will be available. Extends NetBeans JAXP/parsers support and JAXP/transform is accessible.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Java Server Faces Component Library
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Java Server Faces Component Library

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: JSF Metadata Processor
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: JSF XML Metadata Parser and BeanInfo Generator

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: JSF Support Container
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: JSF Component Support Container (Mock Runtime)
Integration module for JSP Syntax Coloring module.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Support for JWSDP
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides necesssary Jar files for JWSDP support.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Implementation for Layout Manager
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds classes implementing the Layout manager of the window system.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Module for managing installed serial numbers
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Module for managing installed serial numbers

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The navigation editor lets you edit the page flow
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The navigation editor lets you edit the page flow
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.openide.io > 1.0, org.openide.loaders > 4.11, com.sun.rave.designer/1, com.sun.rave.insync/1, com.sun.rave.project/1, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1, org.netbeans.api.xml/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The Compiler API and associated classes.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The org.openide.compiler.* API package, as well as compilation-related actions, CompilerCookie, and CompilerSupport.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The original Debugger API from the Open APIs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: A simple API for controlling basic aspects of debugging. Likely to be replaced in the future with a more comprehensive API, but available for compatibility purposes in the meantime.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Old Open APIs which should be avoided.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains classes from various Open APIs packages which should no longer be used, as they violate proper separation of the APIs into domains.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Deprecation-Message: Clients of obsoleted Open APIs are encouraged to remove this dependency. See https://netbeans.org/download/dev/javadoc/OpenAPIs/org/openide/doc-files/upgrade.html#3.5i-sep-I

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Execution API from the Open APIs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Consists of the org.openide.execution.* package from the Open APIs, as well as ExecCookie, ArgumentsCookie, ExecuteAction, and ExecutionSupport.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Open APIs relating to displaying output.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains classes from org.openide.windows.* relating to creating output tabs, displaying output, and hyperlinking it.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: NetBeans Open API for manipulating data objects.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Datasystems API is a layer atop the Filesystems API which recognizes and groups data objects and gives them particular semantics. Once a part of the general Open APIs, it is now split into an independent module.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The NetBeans Open APIs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This pseudo-module represents the Open APIs (org.openide.*), which are used by all other NetBeans modules.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Experimental API extensions used by various modules.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module provides various extensions to the APIs, which other modules rely on, but it does not provide any user-visible features. Note: the APIs provided in this module are considered experimental and can be changed in a backward incompatible way without notice.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Project Manager for managing application files & resources
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Project Manager for managing application files & resources
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.openide.io > 1.0, org.openide.debugger, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.core/3, org.netbeans.modules.debugger.jpda/1, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.apache.tools.ant.module/3, org.netbeans.api.web.dd/1, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeserver/3, org.netbeans.modules.j2eeapis/1, org.netbeans.modules.schema2beans/1, org.netbeans.modules.editor/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Supports editing of .properties files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Resource Bundles module provides support for browsing .properties files in the Explorer and editing them in the Source Editor or in a table view.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Dynamic help pages for the IDE
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Contains the actual JavaHelp content files for the Java Studio Creator Dynamic Help

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Rave Look And Feel Implementation
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for Rave Look And Feel

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Samples and startup scripts
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Samples and startup scripts
RowSets and Design Time SQL and Naming

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Library for representing XML as java beans.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: XML data binding generator. This module is a library of support classes for generating beans corresponding to XML descriptors.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Library for representing XML as java beans; development time variant.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: XML data binding generator. This module is a library for generating beans corresponding to XML descriptors.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Server Navigator Implementation
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for hosting services in the Server Navigator Explorer

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Servlet 2.4/JSP 2.0 API Library
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Servlet 2.4/JSP 2.0 API Library

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: A terminal emulator library written in Java.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: A pure-Java terminal emulator capable of handling usual cursor control sequences, scrolling, selection, copying, redirection of output, and so on. Used in NetBeans for the Output Window.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Enables the IDE to work with text files.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The Text module enables the IDE to recognize files with the .txt extension so that you can work with them in the Source Editor.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Component Palette
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Component Palette
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: com.sun.rave.project/1 > 1.0.1, com.sun.rave.jsfmetadata/1, com.sun.rave.jsfsupport/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.insync/1 > 1.0.2, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.apache.tools.ant.module/3, org.openide.io > 1.1.2

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Support for file searching, bookmarks.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The User Utilities module provides miscellaneous pieces of functionality such as support for URLs (bookmarks), and file searching. It also provides the open file feature, which helps you open a file in a previously unmounted filesystem.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Provides support for parsing JSP files using the Jakarta JSP parser.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The JSP Parser module provides parsing capability for JSP files. Anthough it does not have a visible user interface, it is used internally for implementation of JSP Syntax Coloring and Code Completion features, as well as for JSP compilation.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Provides syntax coloring for JSP files in the Source Editor.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The JSP Syntax Coloring module provides syntax coloring in the source editor for Java Server Pages.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.editor/1 > 1.6, org.netbeans.modules.servletapi24/1 > 2.0.3, org.netbeans.modules.html/1, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.netbeans.modules.web.jspparser/2, org.netbeans.modules.xml.text/2 = 3.6.2, org.openide.loaders > 4.11

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Web Service Support
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for Web Services consumption in web applications.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.schema2beans/1, org.netbeans.modules.schema2beansdev/1, org.netbeans.modules.editor/1 > 1.14.3, com.sun.rave.project/1 > 1.0.1, com.sun.rave.toolbox/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.designer/1 > 1.0.2, org.openide.compiler > 1.0, org.openide.execution > 1.0, org.openide.loaders > 4.11, org.netbeans.modules.autoupdate/1, com.sun.rave.sam/1 > 1.0.2, com.sun.rave.jwsdpsupport/1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Welcome Page
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Provides support for welcome page

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Implementation for window Manager
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Adds classes implementing the Window Manager of the window system.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module bundles Apache Xalan 2.3.1 (XSLT stylesheet processor).
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module bundles Apache Xalan 2.3.1 (XSLT stylesheet processor), i.e. JAXP/transform 1.1 API implementation.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: This module bundles Apache Xerces 2.0.2 (XML parsers).
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module bundles Apache Xerces 2.0.2 (XML parsers), i.e. JAXP/parsers 1.1 API implementation.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: This module contains XML tools API and SPI.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This module contains XML tools API. This module also offers SPI to support another API implementation plug in.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module allows to persistently mount entity catalogs.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module allows to persistently mount entity catalogs. This implementation supports NetBeans native catalog and standard XML catalog. Module also offers SPI to support another catalog implementation plug in.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module is a base for all XML related modules.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module is a base for all XML related modules. It recognizes XML and DTD documents, which can be opened in text editor. It supports parsing of those documents into TAX (Tree API for XML) representation. It supports synchronization among document representations. It also holds all settings shared among all XML related modules.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module contains Tree API for XML ("TAX") library.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module contains Tree API for XML ("TAX") library. It allows tree manipulation of XML and DTD documents structure, including event, traversal and i/o support.

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: The module provides text editing capabilities.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: The module provides text editing capabilities. It adds syntax coloring, simple code completion, abbreviation support and simple code formatting rule into text editing of XML and DTD documents.

module_updates.license:
Sun Microsystems, Inc. モジュールライセンス契約書
ソフトウェア: SUN JAVA STUDIO CREATOR
SUN は、お客様が本モジュールライセンス契約書（以下「モジュール契約」という） の全条項を承諾することを条件としてのみ、お客様が本ウェブサイト上で以下の モジュールを使用することを許諾します。お客様には本契約書条項をよくお読み くださるようお願いいたします。これらの条項全てに同意される場合は本契約書 末尾の「同意する」ボタンを、同意できない条項がある場合には、本契約書末尾の 「同意しない」ボタンを選択してください。
1. モジュールクラスタ: モジュールクラスタは、モジュール集合体（以下 「モジュール」という）をダウンロードおよびインストールするための効率的な 方法を提供することを目的としています。モジュールの既定グループ化は、個々 のモジュールがリリースされたからといって、追加的に互換性検査が行われた ことを必ずしも示唆しません。ユーザが相反するモジュールを選択しないで、 モジュールのグループ化をカスタマイズすることはお客様自身の責任です。
2. ソフトウェアのライセンス許諾: モジュールは適正にライセンス付与された Sun Microsystems, Inc. のお客様によってのみ使用されるよう意図されています。 下の「同意する」ボタンをクリックすると、お客様が Sun Microsystems, Inc. の顧客であり、適正なソフトウェアライセンス契約（以下「ソフトウェア契約」 という）の下で上記のとおり同定されるソフトウェア（以下「ソフトウェア」 という）に対してライセンスが付与されていることを表明し、保証するものと 見なされます。
3. 使用許諾: 本モジュール契約条項に従い、Sun はお客様に対し、モジュールを ソフトウェアにバンドルしてのみ使用する非独占的で譲渡不能な限定的使用権を 付与します。お客様は、ソフトウェア契約の下でお客様に付与されたライセンス 権利に従った形態でモジュールを使用することに同意します。モジュールの リリース・ノートに明示されない限り、お客様にはバンドルされていない モジュールを再頒布するライセンスを第三者に許諾する権利はありません。
4. 限定保証: これらのモジュールは、Sun のお客様の便宜を図るためにのみ Sun が提供するものです。Sun は、お客様がモジュールを受け取った日から 90 日間、 正常に使用された場合に限り、モジュールが取り付けられた媒体（存在する場合） の材質および技量に瑕疵がないことを保証します。上記事項を除いて、本モジュール は「現状のまま」で提供されます。この限定保証の下でのお客様に対する唯一の 救済策および Sun の全責任は、Sun の自由選択により、モジュール媒体の交換か、 もしくはモジュールに対して支払われた代金の払い戻しのいずれかです。
5. 保証の否認: 本モジュール契約で明記されない限り、あらゆる明示的または 黙示的条件、表明および保証は、これらの否認が法的に無効とみなされる場合を 除き、商品性の黙示的保証や特定目的への適合性、または権利の非侵害性を含めて すべて、否認されます。
6. 責任の限度: 法律で許容される範囲内で、Sun またはそのライセンサーは、 責任理論のいかんに拘わらず原因が何であったとしても、またたとえ Sun がかかる 損害の可能性を予め忠告されていたとしても、当モジュールの使用もしくは使用不能 に起因あるいは関連するかに拘わらず、いかなる収入や利益の損失、データの消失、 特別、間接的、偶発的、付随的、懲罰的損害賠償に対しても、一切責任を負わない ものとします。いかなる場合も、お客様に対する Sun の責任は、契約、不法行為 （過失を含む）、もしくはその他の何であるかに拘わらず、本モジュール契約に 基づいてお客様が本モジュールに対して支払った金額を超えることはありません。 上記の制限は、前述の保証がその本来の目的を達成しない場合でも適用されます。 上記条項のいずれかが準拠法に違反、無効、もしくはいかなる裁判管轄地においても 強制できないと見なされる場合は、かかる裁判管轄地において本契約が他の方法で 執行可能となるために必要な限りにおいて、これらの条項は撤回されます。
7. 第三者ライセンス: モジュールによっては第三者コードを含んでいることが あります。モジュールの一部に適用される追加的な著作権およびライセンス条項は、 THIRDPARTYLICENSEREADME ファイルに記述されています。THIRDPARTYLICENSEREADME ファイルに明記されているあらゆる第三者オープンソース/フリーウェアライセンス 条項に加えて、本モジュール契約の第 5 項および第 6 項およびソフトウェア契約書 の該当条項に記載の「保証の否認」および「責任の限度」条項がこの頒布における すべてのモジュールに適用されるものとします。
8. 完全性: ソフトウェア契約を除き、本モジュール契約書はモジュールに関する お客様と Sun との間の完全な合意書であり、お客様と Sun との間の当該事項に 関する事前または同時になされた口頭あるいは書面による協議や提案、表明よりも 優先されます。また、お客様と Sun との間で交わされた見積もり、注文、承認、 または同様の協議における矛盾や非一貫性、追加条項がある場合は、本契約が優先 されます。
お問い合わせ先: Sun Microsystems, Inc., 4150 Network Circle, Santa Clara, California 95054.

Sun Microsystems, Inc. 模块许可协议
软件：SUN JAVA STUDIO Creator 2004Q2
SUN愿意在本网站向您提供以下模块，但条件是您须接受本模块许可协议（以下简称 “模块协议”）所含的所有条款。请仔细阅读本协议的条款和条件。如果您接受这些条款， 请选择本协议结尾处的“接受”按钮。如果您不同意所有这些条款，请选择本协议结尾处的 “不接受”按钮。
1. 模块组: 本协议项下提供的模块组，目的在于提供一种下载和安装整套模块 (以下简称 “模块”)的简便方法。虽然预先设定了模块组合，但并不一定表示单个模块发布以来进行 了更多的兼容测试。当用户自己进行模块组合时，有责任确保没有将互相冲突的模块组合 在一起。
2. 软件许可: 模块仅供已从 Sun Microsystems，Inc.获得适当许可的客户使用。通过点 击下面的“接受”按钮，您声明并保证：您是 Sun Microsystems，Inc.的客户，并已根 据有效适当的软件许可协议（以下简称“软件协议”）获得使用以上所述软件（以下简称 “软件”）之许可。
3. 使用许可: 在遵守本模块协议的条款和条件的情况下，Sun给予您非排它、不可转让、 有限的许可，允许您仅将模块与软件捆绑在一起使用。您同意按照符合随软件协议授予 您的许可权利的方式使用模块。除非模块发布声明中有明确阐述，否则您无权许可第三方 再分发拆开的模块。
4. 有限保证: Sun仅为方便 Sun的客户而提供这些模块。Sun向您保证，自您收到模块之日 起九十（90）天内，本模块的提供介质（如果有的话）在正常使用的情况下不会出现材料 和工艺方面的缺陷。除上述保证外，模块按“原样”提供。在本有限担保项下，您的所有 补偿及 Sun的全部责任仅限于由 Sun选择更换本模块的介质或退还本模块的购买费用。
5. 保证的免责声明: 除非在本模块协议中有明确规定，否则对于任何明示或默示的条件、 陈述及保证，包括对适销性、特定用途适用性或非侵权性的任何默示保证，均不予负责， 但上述免责声明如被认定为法律上无效则除外。
6. 责任限制: 在法律允许的范围内，无论在何种情况下，无论采用何种有关责任的理论， 无论因何种方式导致，对于因使用或无法使用本模块引起的或与之相关的任何收益损失、 利润或数据损失，或者对于特殊的、间接的、后果性的、偶发的或惩罚性的损害赔偿， Sun或其许可方概不负责，即使Sun事先已被告知可能发生此等损害亦是如此。根据本协议， 在任何情况下，无论是基于合同、侵权行为（包括过失）还是其他原因，Sun对您的责任 将不超过您根据本模块协议为本模块所支付的金额。即使上述担保不能达至其根本目的， 前述限制亦适用。如果上列任何规定在任何司法管辖区被认定为违反有关法律、无效、 或无法执行，则此等规定将从本协议分割出来，而不影响本协议其他部分在该司法管辖区 的可执行性。
7. 第三方许可: 某些模块可能含有第三方代码。THIRDPARTYLICENSEREADME文件中载有 更多关于本软件某些部分的版权声明和许可条款。除THIRDPARTYLICENSEREADME文件所列出 的任何第三方开放源/自由软件许可证的任何条款和条件之外，本模块协议第5款和第6款 中的保证的免责声明及责任限制规定以及软件协议的等效条款均适用于本次分发的所有模块。
8. 完整性: 除软件协议之外，本模块协议是您与Sun就模块达成的完整协议。它取代此前 或同期您与Sun之间有关本协议标的所有口头或书面往来信息、建议及陈述。如果您与Sun 之间的任何报价、订单、回执、或类似的往来通信中有任何冲突、不一致、或附加的条款， 均以本协议为准。
如有疑问，请联系：Sun Microsystems, Inc. 4150 Network Circle, Santa Clara, California 95054。
